reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 353/02: APPROVAL AUTHORITY - PLANS OF SUBDIVISION
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 353/02: APPROVAL AUTHORITY - PLANS OF SUBDIVISION

content.content: 2. The lower-tier municipalities listed in Schedule 2 are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 51 (6) of the Act.  O. Reg. 353/02, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The lower-tier municipalities listed in Schedule 2 are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 51 (6) of the Act.  O. Reg. 353/02, s. 2.

content.content: 3. The single-tier municipalities listed in Schedule 3 are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 51 (7) of the Act.  O. Reg. 353/02, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. The single-tier municipalities listed in Schedule 3 are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 51 (7) of the Act.  O. Reg. 353/02, s. 3.
